artist: Designer: Christopher Dresser; Manufacturer: Old Hall Earthenware Company
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Catherine Futter
description: four-sided; tapered from bottom to top; multicolored decoration (blue-green, red-brown, yellow, light blue); blue rim; blue stripe on handle
markings: \'Old Hall/England/E\'ware 02 (L)\', mark, on bottom; illegible inscription, in blue, on bottom
title: Pitcher
